price: Iná yóò máa kùn yùn-ùn sí wọn létí; wọn kò sì níí gbọ́ (ọ̀rọ̀ mìíràn).
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā zafīrun wahum fīhā lā yasmaʿūna
